head.title: Atlantic City: School Fined For Withholding Records

hedline.hl1: Atlantic City: School Fined For Withholding Records
hedline.hl2: Atlantic City: School Fined for Withholding Records

block.p: A school board that refused to provide complete minutes of board meetings has been ordered to pay $18,000 in penalties and legal fees after a newspaper sued. In January, The Press of Atlantic City sued the Pleasantville Board of Education in State Superior Court over records of five closed meetings last year. Last week, Judge Steven Perskie ordered the district to pay the newspaper $15,000 for legal fees and $3,000 in penalties. The cost to the district, including legal fees, came to just over $50,000, The Press reported.
